sentences.cn: ...一位微生物学和免疫学教授。

sentences.en: Biology, microbiology in particular, had fascinated him from his earliest student days.
sentences.cn: 生物学, 特别是微生物学, 从他最早的学生时代就令他着迷.

sentences.en: Botany, zoology, biochemistry and molecular biology, cell biology, microbiology, genetics, fermentation engineering.
sentences.cn: 植物学, 动物学, 生物化学与分子生物学, 细胞生物学, 微生物学, 遗传学, 发酵工程.

sentences.en: Crop rotations with legumes help maintain fertility and soil microbiology.
sentences.cn: 与豆类轮作可以保持土壤的肥力和微生态.

sentences.en: His research is the last word in microbiology.
sentences.cn: 他的研究在微生物学方面达到了登峰造极的地步.

sentences.en: His work advanced the science of microbiology.
sentences.cn: 他的工作促进了微生物学这门科学.

sentences.en: It dedicates to the science, practice and application of microbiology and virology.
sentences.cn: 该图书馆致力于微生物学与病毒学的科学 、 践与应用.

sentences.en: Medical microbiology is a main subject of basic medicine.
sentences.cn: 医学微生物学是医学生的专业基础必修课.

sentences.en: Microbiology is part and parcel of biology.
sentences.cn: 微生物学是生物学的组成部分.

sentences.en: One of the most important functions of the diagnostic microbiology laboratory.
sentences.cn: 微生物实验室诊断是最重要的手段之一.

sentences.en: Presently he is Virology Editor - in - Chief of'Veterinary Microbiology '.
sentences.cn: 现在他是“兽医微生物学”病毒学 总编辑.

sentences.en: Sterilization: Medical device free of living Microbiology.
sentences.cn: 无菌: 医疗器具上无存活微生物.

sentences.en: The Microbiology Senior Analsyt reports to the Micro Lab Manager.
sentences.cn: 微生物实验室高级分析员向微生物实验室经理汇报.

sentences.en: The study of micro - organisms is known as microbiology.
sentences.cn: 微生物的研究被称作微生物学.

sentences.en: This major combines microbiology with zymology and wine - making studies.
sentences.cn: 这个专业将微生物学,发酵学和制酒相结合.
